titleStmt.title: Ordines cancellariæ, being orders of the High Court of Chancery, from the first year of King Charles I, to this present Hillary term, 1697 ... to which is added the Rules and orders of the Court of Exchequer.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Chancery.
England and Wales. Court of Exchequer. Rules and orders of the Court of Exchequer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Rich. and Edw. Atkins, Esquires, for J. Walthoe, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "The rules and orders of the Court of Exchequer" has special t.p.
